projects: [{"title":"Task_Tracker_Senti","start_date":"Apr 2021","description":"* Created a UI based on machine learning for sentiment analysis for a venture to give a better customer experience by knowing the sentiment of the customer’s feedback.* Used Creme and naïve-Bayes for machine learning. NLTK for analyzing the sentiment.* Used RoBERTa, AlBERT for further analysis of sentiment into sub-classifications to give better insights about customers emotions do the company. * Flask frameworkwas used as an interface between frontend and backend. SQLite was used to create the database in the backend."}]
